vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Issachar living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Gen.46.13;
son of: Issachar (H3485);
brother of: Tola (H8439), Jashub (H3437H) and Shimron (H8110B); also called Puvah (KJV: Phuvah) at Gen.46.13; 1xPunite at Num.26.23;
Also named: pu.ni (פּוּנִי "Punite" H6324)
§ Puah or Pua or Phuvah = "splendid"
1) son of Issachar
1a) also 'Pua' and 'Phuvah'
2) man of Issachar, father of Tola, the judge of Israel after Abimelech
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
普瓦 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "燦爛的"
1) 以薩迦的兒子 (創 46:13; 民 26:23; 代上 7:1)
2) 以薩迦人, 士師陀拉的父親 (士 10:1)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
普瓦 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "灿烂的"
1) 以萨迦的儿子 (创 46:13; 民 26:23; 代上 7:1)
2) 以萨迦人, 士师陀拉的父亲 (士 10:1)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, only mentioned at Jdg.10.1;
daughter of: Dodo (H1734);
mother of: Tola (H8439H)
§ Puah or Pua or Phuvah = "splendid"
1) son of Issachar
1a) also 'Pua' and 'Phuvah'
2) man of Issachar, father of Tola, the judge of Israel after Abimelech
